projects.description: With an API I built in a previous project, I used React to implement the front end and create the final product, which works as a database of classes for a school. This project features user sign-up, sign-in, and sign-out functionality using basic authentication and database operations which can be performed by those users. It was built using React, JSX, React Router, React Context API, and Create React App.
This is a project which implements a SQL database and allows the user to use CRUD operations on that database, which is a list of books.
A site made using React and Flickr's API which allows users to search for images.

An interactive directory made up of randomly generated people using the random user generator API. Click on each employee to bring up more information. Refreshing the page re-populates the data with new random people.
Hangman game made with Javascript objects. Letters are suggested through the in-browser keyboard.
